title: No In-Game Sound!
body: After the new patch (3.12 I believe it was. I downloaded it on 10/01/2013) I have sound in the launcher and champ select but in the game itself i have absolutely no sound. I thought maybe it was due to playing while using Skype but I've tried it without Skype and it isn't working. Any help?

replies.body:
Try the following:  
Open the options menu once in game, go to the sound page, click "Restore defaults", click okay.  
Tell me if this works or not. :)
